RainbruRPG::Core::StringConv

List of all members.

Detailed Description

A singleton to convert string format.

Be carefull, some functions of this class must be freed by a call to freeTte. Please see the detail of a function before using it.

On Win32, the mbsrtowcs function needs to be linked with the msvcr60, msvcr library.

StringConv can also manage xml strings. It can strip newlines from them or make the newline available in c++ format. See the xmlStripNewLine() and xmlToNewLine() function documentation for more information.

void RainbruRPG::Core::StringConv::freeTte (  ) 

Desalocate the dynamic memory used for the conversion.

You must call it after user the char* returned by the wtoc or itoc conversion function only.

stow don't need be freeing.
